summary: This module orchestrates the evaluation workflow for the function-call leaderboard. It loads configuration, selects the appropriate checker (AST, executable, multi‑turn, relevance) for each test case, runs the checks, aggregates scores, and updates the leaderboard table.
business_intent: Automate the scoring of model submissions for a function-call leaderboard by providing a unified pipeline that evaluates correctness, execution, multi‑turn interaction, and relevance of generated code.
